testcase.classname: F01_Register | user could register and make Account
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user enter the registration page......................................passed When user select gender "male"..............................................passed And user enter first name "Mohamed" and last name "tester"..................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter registration email "mohamed_th2030@gmail.comm"...............passed And user enter company "fwd"................................................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" and "P@ssw0rd"....................passed Then user click on register button to save data.............................passed And user registration completed successfully................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user should be able to login the system

testcase.system-out: When user navigate to login page............................................passed And user enter "mohamed_th2030@gmail.comm" and "P@ssw0rd"...................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed And user login successfully and go to home page.............................passed
